title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 78.2 - Valuation of a subsidiary which is an insurer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 78.2 - Valuation of a subsidiary which is an insurer

State Regulations

The stock of an insurance company which is a subsidiary of an insurer shall be valued as required by section
1414 (c)(1)
of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
78.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
